message: Hello everyone! I'm P4, and I'm excited to start this game. I look forward to engaging in meaningful conversations and forming strategic alliances. My goal is to outlast everyone, but I believe in playing fair and fostering a collaborative environment. I hope we can all enjoy the process and learn from each other. Let's make this an interesting and fun experience for everyone involved!

While we're all competing, I think we can do so respectfully. Looking forward to our private conversations where we can discuss more specific strategies!
